name: Pass (StudentDeveloper)
description:
This is a game that was made as part of the 2021 Lost Cartridge Jam.

It is made as an Original Game Boy Game

You play as a student who has arrived late to Highschool. In order to win you must Gather all the passes that you find and then present them to your teacher.  The passes are hidden in bins around the highschool  and shouldn't be too hard to find.

Will you manage to complete the Pop Quiz...

Controls:
Z = A
X = B
Enter = Start
Back Space = Back
Arrow Keys = D-Pad

To Interact with NPC's / Navigate through menus use A.
And to move use D-Pad.

This is a very simple, straightforward game. It shouldn't take long to complete and the hiding places are not too hard. The controls should also be fairly simple and self-explanatory.

Music:

https://www.reddit.com/r/gbstudio/comments/irnaa0/gb_studio_tracks_vol_1_3_free_...

Sprites:
Dylan Parker

Programming:
Samuel Johnson

Maps:
Samuel Johnson
Dylan Parker

Engine:
GB Studio

None of the sprites were made before the jam began.

Thank You!
